name: 林忻怡
objective:
以數學與物理的方法來探討化學之原理，物質之結構與性質，內容包括由氣體動力論衍導熱力學之基本定律，物理平衡（相平衡）、化學平衡、電化學、反應動力學、輸送性質等。
Applying mathematical and physical principles to explain the theories of chemistry, molecular structures and properties of matter. The content include but not limited to the basic laws of thermal dynamics, phase equilibrium, chemical equilibrium,  electrochemistry, reaction kinetics, and transport properties.
